name: The Union Bar's Banga #1
description: This playful concoction from Arthur Wynne at The Union Bar in Vancouver is juicy and thirst-quenching. You'll need a lidded glass jar for each cocktail.

recipeInstructions.text: In a glass jar, muddle lime wedge, lemongrass, rambutans, basil, and galangal. Once the herbs are bruised and the rambutans are crushed, add the gomme syrup and gin.
Twist the lid onto the jar and shake for 10 seconds. Remove the lid and fill the jar with crushed ice. Garnish with Thai basil and serve with a straw.
